ing: 1 (1 ounce) package ranch dressing mix (such as Hidden Valley Ranch Â®)
des: "This is a recipe that we have made for years that is a BIG crowd pleaser.  Very easy to make!"
ins: Stir the sour cream, Cheddar cheese, bacon bits, ranch mix, chili powder, and cayenne pepper in a bowl. Chill in refrigerator 1 hour before serving.
